channel.title: Client "Error connecting"
channel.description:
I've used a couple different sources and clients but I just cant get my client to connect to my server. Locally I can get a connection but when I put the server on my poweredge it never connects.
Heres what I've done so far:
Firewalls off on both machines Server is correctly portforwarded (checked using canyouseeme.com) Client IP and port set correctly. Client computer can ping the server's no-ip which is configured properly also. Both machines using JDK1.7.0
Any help is much appreciated!

item.title: Client "Error connecting"
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

Are you using 2 different computers that are connecting to the same internet?

Read full topic

item.title: Client "Error connecting"
item.dc:creator: @GTR1 -GTR-
item.description:
@GTR1 wrote:

I’ve used a couple different sources and clients but I just cant get my client to connect to my server. Locally I can get a connection but when I put the server on my poweredge it never connects.

Heres what I’ve done so far:

Firewalls off on both machines
Server is correctly portforwarded (checked using canyouseeme.com)
Client IP and port set correctly.
Client computer can ping the server’s no-ip which is configured properly also.
Both machines using JDK1.7.0

Any help is much appreciated!
